ygData.subject: Re: Rune of Proximity
ygData.msgSnippet: It is just a research item.  Runes are used by wizards, Words by mages, I m not sure what necros use, and we use pages. Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
ygData.messageBody:
It is just a research item. Runes are used by wizards, Words by mages, I'm
not sure what necros use, and we use pages.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath


> -----Original Message-----
> From: okandrea@... [mailto:okandrea@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 7:00 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Rune of Proximity
>
>
> From: okandrea@...
>
> Hail fellow Enchanters,
> Last night after taking down a Kodiak I got a Rune of Proximity
> as loot. It looks
> stange and though it must be a quest item. When I went to sell
> some stuff, I tryed
> selling that too but, being a quest item I belived, I would get
> nothing for it. To my
> surprise an Innkeeper offered me nearly 2pp for it!
> Does anyone have any idea what this rune is for?
> Eregil - Mith.
> Marr
>
